title: The P.E.T. Squad Files
resume: Following the comic misadventures of a ragtag group of ex-community college students turned paranormal investigators. Led by Spencer and Courtney, the team films their forays into the world of ghost-hunting in the hopes of one day landing a reality TV show. But while Courtney is dead serious in his hunt for the undead, Spencer is only seriously dying to be famous.

Led by Spencer and Courtney, the team films their forays into the world of ghost-hunting in the hopes of one day landing a reality TV show. But while Courtney is dead serious in his hunt for the undead, Spencer is only seriously dying to be famous.
